title: Multidimensional Outcomes in ‘Real World’ Mental Health Services. Follow-up Findings from the South Verona Outcome Project. Edited by A. Lasalvia and M. Ruggeri. Acta Psychiatrica Scandinavica Supplementum no. 437, volume 116. Blackwell. 2007.
